article_title: Flash Point: Humphreys says Republicans should not tie shutdown to Obamacare
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

The main topic of this Flash Point segment is the government shutdown. The Republican party is getting most of the blame and Kirk Humphreys says the republican's mistake was tying the shutdown to the Affordable Healthcare Act. He says they should have tied it all to entitlement reform.

Mike Turpen says elections have consequences and this will hurt the Republicans in the 2014 elections.
